title: 装了几个MOD后提示这个。。。
author: moline
txt_content:
cb's deploader was unable to download required library bspkrscore universal
check your internet connection and try restarting or download it manually from
求告知怎么回事

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content: 无法从那个链接下载文件（你下MOD的地方应该提供了这个文件的下载）

replies.author: moline
replies.txt_content: 好吧 我就懒得弄了，直接恢复原来的把
